text: Kamaghɨn amizɨ a Simein diazɨma a izima, a kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Kɨ nɨ gamizɨma, nɨ Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn damazimɨn akar dɨkɨrɨzim akɨrigha ghaze, Nɨ Jerusalem ategh tintinibar daruan kogham. Egha kɨ kamaghɨn pamtemɨn nɨ mɨgɨa ghaze, Nɨ nguibar ekiam ateghtɨ, kɨ zuamɨra aruer kamra nɨ mɨsueghtɨ nɨ aremegham. Ezɨ nɨ kamaghɨn na ikara, A dera, kɨ nɨn akamɨn gɨn mangam.
